about_the_game:
Gameplay


In HAXWARE: Enforcer Games you collect power granting gemstones called HAXWARE from clearing a boss, & level them up to do more devastating attacks. There are 5 base elemental HAXWARE, Fire, Water, Wind, Terra, & Electricity, that can be paired to make dozens of more powerful HAXWARE. Every HAXWARE has 4 attributes with points assigned to them, & you can re-arrange these points at any time to fundamentally change how the HAXWARE functions. Take these strategies you discover & face off against both common, & rare bosses!

Level up your HAXWARE


When you get your first HAXWARE, they will be weak, you will have to level them up to become stronger & do devastating damage.

Fight Challenging Bosses


Test you skills against common bosses, & occasional rare ones.

Create your own builds

Alter the attributes on the same HAXWARE to make completely different functioning abilities.

& that's everything! Welcome To The Enforcer Games, Newcomer. Now go & make a name for yourself!

short_description: HAXWARE: Enforcer Games is a an Action Roguelike that focuses on discovering your own magic fusions, & strategic ways to use them. Enforcer Games gives you thousands of ways to develop your own personalized strategy to do it as you face off against foes & challenging bosses!
